title: OPC UA to MQTT Stack
description: This stack deploys an OPC UA PLC simulation, OPC Router, Mosquitto MQTT broker, and a management dashboard.
note: This stack sets up an OPC UA PLC simulation, OPC Router for data handling, Mosquitto MQTT broker for messaging, and a management dashboard with Nginx.

env.name: INITIAL_USERNAME
env.label: Initial Admin User
env.description: The initial username for the OPC Router admin user.

env.name: INITIAL_PASSWORD
env.label: Initial Admin Password
env.description: The initial password for the OPC Router admin user.

env.name: OR_I_ACCEPT_EULA
env.label: Accept EULA
env.description: Accept the End User License Agreement
